snippet.title: Slime Rancher - Official PlayStation 4 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Slime Rancher is now available on PlayStation 4!

Buy here: http://bit.ly/SR-PS4

PS4 exclusive DLC is coming soon to Slime Rancher. Use the new DLC Playset to dress up your slimes as heroic adventurers and watch them fight off a hoard of toy bop goblins. Install the PS4-exclusive Sapphire Chroma Pack to give your ranch house, vacpack, and ranch tech a shiny, new paint job!

The physical retail edition for Xbox One and PS4 will be in stores this September. Sign up for our newsletter for more information on when it will release! http://eepurl.com/dnL0cT

Follow us to stay up to date on news and events!

http://www.twitter.com/monomipark
http://www.instagram.com/monomi_park
http://www.blog.monomipark.com


Developed by Monomi Park
http://www.slimerancher.com
http://www.monomipark.com
